ygData.subject: Re: Computer Specs for Bards
ygData.msgSnippet: Well here is mine Computer Specs for Bards CPU: AMD Athlon 550 RAM: 128MB 133MHz Video Card (and RAM): Asus Geforce V6800, 32Mb DDRam Video Resolution:
ygData.messageBody:
Well here is mine
Computer Specs for Bards

CPU: AMD Athlon 550
RAM: 128MB 133MHz
Video Card (and RAM): Asus Geforce V6800, 32Mb DDRam
Video Resolution: 1024x768
Sound Card: Soundblaster Live!
HD speed (rpm): 5400
'Net speed: ISDN 64Kbit
Geographic Location: denmark

Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Max
Particle Effects: Max, unless I am in particle heavy groups/areas, then I
turns it down for my eyes sake
Mip Mapping: N/a
Clip plane distance: max

How many songs can you twist? 3 without problems
Do you slow down when it rains? nope
How about in Unrest or Kunark? 3

Note: Problems with athlons and Geforce's are mostly connected to the fact that
the atlon and Geforce needs LOTS of power, and just because a PS is labeled 300W
does not mean that its better than another brand labeled 200W, you have to be
carefull and select one that truely delivers the power it promises.


and got a second system aswell, not used much anymore, but still available..

CPU: P166 running 188Mhz
RAM: 96Mb 100MHz
Video Card (and RAM): Voodoo 1
Video Resolution: 604x480
Sound Card: Soundblaster Live!
HD speed (rpm): 5400
'Net speed: ISDN 64Kbit
Geographic Location: denmark

Options enabled or disabled:
Sky texturing: Low
Particle Effects: off
Mip Mapping: N/a
Clip plane distance: low-mid/high, depending on zone and crowding

How many songs can you twist? 2 without problems, 3 when counting
Do you slow down when it rains? nope
How about in Unrest or Kunark? Havent tried Kunark, but unrest 2

Musiker Silverdrum, bard of the 37th song
